maze.logic

Class MazeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.MazeGame

  • public class MazeGame
extends java.lang.Object
    MazeGame.java - A class for representing the game of the maze. The game: Our hero wakes up after listening the voices of the dragons. Now, he need to get out of the maze with a sword and kill all the dragons.

      • setOptions

        public static void setOptions(int mazeDim,
              int dragonOp,
              int nDrag,
              char[] moveChars)
        Set all the necessary game options. Options like the Maze Dimension, the Dragon Behaviour, the keyboard controls, etc
        Parameters:
        mazeDim - the maze Dimension
        dragonOp - the dragon behaviour
        nDrag - the number of dragons
        moveChars - the keyboard controls

      • startGui

        public static void startGui()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Starts a new Game GUI.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setupObjects

        public static void setupObjects()
        Setup all the objects in the maze about their position and initial state. Note that this function behaves based in the user options given.

      • gameOver

        public static int gameOver()
        Evaluate if the Game is Over. The game can end if the hero is killed by a Dragon or if the hero reached the exit with a sword.
        Returns:
        true if hero is killed or reached exit

      • updateObject

        public static void updateObject(GameObject a,
                int x,
                int y,
                char state)
        Update a specified object in the maze Game.
        Parameters:
        a - the object
        x - the new x position
        y - the new y position
        state - the new state
